bibl.title: Letter from Delia A. Lynch to Philip Showalter Hench, April, 13, 1942

div1.p: Lynch sends Hench a photograph of Pinto.

div1.head: Letter from Delia A. Lynch to Philip Showalter Hench, April, 13, 1942
div1.opener:
DR. DELIA A. LYNCH
712 WORLD-HERALD BUILDING
PHONE JACKSON 5137
OMAHA
April, 13, 1942
Dr. P. S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minn.
Dear Doctor Hench:
div1.p:
I am enclosing photostatic copy of the
picture of Dr. Pinto taken during his early
work in service also his war records, which
I secured from Mrs. Pinto.

I wish I might see you while here.
Thanking you, I am,
div1.closer:
Very sincerely, Delia A Lynch
Very truly
A. S. Pinto
Ass. U. S. A.
May - 1890
Y. A. Suarez
O'REILLY, 04, HABANA.
